title: How to replace TPS22924
message: Do you replace TPS22924 from donor board or only new as they are bga chip?

title: How to replace TPS22924
message:
Only new because rebelling a $1 chip is not worth the time it takes to reball manually 
​​

title: How to replace TPS22924
message: I put the balls on the board and clean the chip.

title: How to replace TPS22924
message: Whatever balls fit. I think I use .3 or .35
